snippet.title: Perception - Mode 7
snippet.description:
Please support us by pre-ordering today at:

www.thedeependgames.com

The Deep End Games reveals a stretch goal for Perception. "Mode 7" is a retro inspired mode that changes the look and sound of Perception to feel just like a 16-bit game.

This homage is a love letter to one of our favorite eras in gaming.
